channel.title: Regular to Blessed?
channel.description:
Ok, how do you make it so if someone has 95 prayer they can use a regular spirit shield on an altar and change it to a blessed spirit shield?
Object = 409 Item ID for regular Spirit Shield = 3633 Item ID for blessed spirit shield = 3635 Skill ID for prayer = 5
